tags.name: c-button
tags.description: RVO button component with Utrecht styling and comprehensive variants

attributes.name: kind
attributes.description: Visual style variant of the button (default: `primary`)

attributes.name: busy
attributes.description: Whether the button shows a loading/busy state (default: `false`)

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon name from RVO icon set

attributes.name: click
attributes.description: JavaScript function to call on click event

attributes.name: mousedown
attributes.description: JavaScript function to call on mousedown event

attributes.name: mouseup
attributes.description: JavaScript function to call on mouseup event

attributes.name: focus
attributes.description: JavaScript function to call on focus event

attributes.name: blur
attributes.description: JavaScript function to call on blur event

attributes.name: keydown
attributes.description: JavaScript function to call on keydown event

attributes.name: keyup
attributes.description: JavaScript function to call on keyup event

tags.name: c-card
tags.description: RVO card component with comprehensive styling and layout options

attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description: Background color from RVO color system (default: `none`)

tags.description: RVO checkbox input with validation support

tags.name: c-select
tags.description: RVO select dropdown with option support

attributes.name: row
attributes.description: Use row layout instead of column (default: `false`)

tags.description: RVO CSS Grid layout container with comprehensive column support

tags.name: c-tag
tags.description: RVO visual tag/badge component

attributes.name: additional-css

attributes.name: expandable-helper-text-title

attributes.description: Site subtitle text displayed below title (default: `Ministerie van Binnenlandse Zaken en Koninkrijksrelaties`)

tags.name: c-ol

attributes.description: Array of list items (strings) - used when not using nested c-li components

tags.name: c-ul
tags.description: RVO unordered list component with proper ul element and styling options

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Array of list items (strings) - used when not using nested c-li components

tags.description: RVO list item component for use within c-ol or c-ul

tags.name: c-list
